patient_info: Muscle weakness,Pericardial effusion,Abnormal tricuspid valve morphology,Palpitations,Vomiting,Abdominal pain,Dyspnea,Exercise intolerance,Poor appetite,Vascular tortuosity,Atrial fibrillation,Tricuspid regurgitation,Pedal edema,Right bundle branch block,Abnormal ST segment,Left ventricular systolic dysfunction,Right atrial enlargement,Increased circulating NT-proBNP concentration,Left atrial enlargement,Abnormality of internal jugular vein
golden_diagnosis: Cardiomyopathy, familial restrictive, 1,家族性/特发性限制型心肌病/Familial/Idiopathic restrictive cardiomyopathy,Cardiomyopathy, familial restrictive, 3,Cardiomyopathy, dilated, 1KK,Cardiomyopathy, familial hypertrophic, 26
predict_diagnosis:
1. Cardiomyopathy, familial hypertrophic, 26
2. Restrictive cardiomyopathy, familial or idiopathic
3. Pericardial effusion, secondary to malignancy
4. Pericarditis, acute or chronic
5. Atrial fibrillation, with concomitant valvular involvement
6. Congestive heart failure, systolic or diastolic
7. Myocarditis, with associated pericardial effusion
8. Pulmonary hypertension, secondary to left heart disease
9. Valvular heart disease, tricuspid regurgitation as a primary or secondary finding
10. Vascular Ehlers-Danlos syndrome or other connective tissue disorders
